hackathon-description-text: Let’s get the creative juices flowing! Team up with your friends for a 24 hours long intense Hackathon! Your task – to build medical devices or Apps that have application in patient health care and monitoring or fitness.
hackathon-eligibility: Any Penn Student can participate in this hackhathon.
hackathon-description-header: If you ever had an amazing idea for a medical device or a patient health care app , but never found the time or the means to implement it, then PTG’s MED-X is your chance.
